message: Outside, I see that the usually deserted alley is teeming with excitement.
Noiz and I join the gathering crowd.

name: ノイズ
message: "It's almost time."
Noiz stops once we've entered the dark alleyway.
He's already holding a Bunny Cube in his hand.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is that your Allmate?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah."
Sure is weird for a guy like him to be using such a cute Allmate...

name: ノイズ
message: "Here it comes."
A faint light blossoms in one corner of the alley.
A ring of light appears in the empty space, and Usui materializes from the feet up.
The crowd cheers, attracting even more people from the street.

name: ノイズ
message: "Told you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah."

name: ノイズ
message: "You should go fight."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I told you, I don't want to."

name: ノイズ
message: "How about now?"
Noiz raises an eyebrow, and then I feel my bag rise into the air.
I spin around. A Bunny Cube is holding my bag by the strap.
When did that get there?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Well? What are you gonna do?"
The crowd is so thick that even if I can snatch my bag back, I won't be able to get away.
Just then, something flies through the air and slams into the Bunny Cube holding my bag.
The crowd stirs, then parts to allow someone through.

name: 紅雀
message: "Yo."
It's Koujaku. It must have been Beni who rammed Noiz's cube. Several Beni-Shigure members are with him too.
He picks up my bag from where it fell.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku..."

name: 紅雀
message: "What's up? Another delivery?"
Koujaku shoots Noiz a glare.

name: 紅雀
message: "What are you doing here?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Why should I tell you?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Rhyme, huh?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I could ask you the same thing. Brain dead Ribsteez wouldn't last a second in Rhyme."

name: 紅雀メンバーＡ
message: "The fuck?!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Stop."
Koujaku grabs his teammate by the shoulder.

name: 紅雀
message: "Kids shouldn't push their luck. You're walking on thin ice, pal."

name: ノイズ
message: "Just speaking truth."

name: 紅雀
message: "I said don't push your luck, punk."

name: ノイズ
message: "Whatever."

name: 紅雀
message: "Talking to you makes me hate Rhyme even more."

name: ノイズ
message: "Good. We don't want you dumbasses to like it."
...Well, this got interesting fast.
As their hostility ripples outward through the crowd, each side's members begin to gather around their leader.
Rib vs Rhyme. The two groups glare at each other, a powder keg waiting for a spark.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, maybe you guys should..."

name: ノイズ
message: "I mean, who even uses fists these days? Talk about analog."

name: 紅雀
message: "Fighting in your head doesn't mean shit. It's just make-believe."

name: ノイズ
message: "Can't say I'm surprised a meathead like you is afraid of the unknown. Dunno why I bother."

name: 紅雀
message: "That's rich coming from an eggheaded beanpole."

name: ノイズ
message: "Who you calling a beanpole?"

name: 紅雀
message: "You sure look like one from here."
That's the same dark tone of voice Koujaku used yesterday, before they started fighting in my room.
Noiz closes his mouth and meets Koujaku stare for stare.

name: 紅雀
message: "You're in the Ruff Rabbits, right? Mujina's Rhyme gang? I see you guys finally got the balls to come all the way out here."

name: 紅雀
message: "I hear you're forecasters. You happy making chump change off that?"

name: ノイズ
message: "It's business."

name: ノイズ
message: "There's a ton of people in this area who want our info."

name: ノイズ
message: "So we do a little business. We just happen to use our brains, unlike you."
For a few moments, Noiz and Koujaku glare at each other in silence.

name: 紅雀
message: "Let's settle this. Right here, right now."

name: ノイズ
message: "I think it's a waste of time, but I don't like you, so―sure, I'll kick your ass."
In no time at all, the crowd has split in two: those gathered around Usui for the Rhyme battle, and those watching the fight between Noiz and Koujaku.
From the looks of it, the crowd around us is bigger. Things are quickly spiraling out of control.

name: 紅雀
message: "I'll make sure you never open that smart mouth of yours again."

name: ノイズ
message: "Not a chance."

Noiz just smirks and cracks his neck.

Shouldn't I do something?
